text: Byzantium is the third studio album by Deep Blue Something. The album was released on November 13, 1998. ==Track listing== # "Daybreak and a Candle End" – 4:42 # "So Precious" – 3:04 # "She Is" – 3:26 # "Cherry Lime Rickey" – 6:26 # "Byzantium" – 4:07 # "Everything" – 3:32 # "Enough To Get By" – 5:10 # "Hell In Itself" – 4:08 # "Dr. Crippen" – 4:00 # "Tonight" – 3:43 # "William H. Bonney" – 4:43 # "Pullman, Washington" – 3:51 # "Light the Fuse" – 3:41 # "Parkbench" – 5:00 # "Becoming Light" – 4:46 ==References== Category:1998 albums
title: Byzantium (album)
